channel.title: loader on Fossix
channel.description: Recent content in loader on Fossix

item.title: Dynamic linker and loader
item.description: As you would have noticed the beginning of the document, it was told the explanation will be based on the program we had written earlier in this series. The program was compiled using the command $ cc sample-source.c -lm As you have probably noticed, we are linking the program with the math library. This was done intentionally to explain the dynamic loader. Any file can be identified using the file command.
